text: This bug did resolve itself after a few hours!

Hello channel!
Need some guidance in the Blog language feature and it's condition.

I've one page with language option in header. For the blog with multiple language variant it works fine. but my concern is to how I can prevent the header to not populate the language option on my HTML based on checking the availability of the language version of the specific article. In short I want to know the condition that we can use to identify if the current article has any other language version or not!

Waiting for the help ASAP! :pray:
